name: RemindThis
overview:
Our goal is to be the #1 service provider in the field of reminding a revisiting of websites.

Weâ€™re constantly developing new modules, improve existing modules and work according to our usersâ€™ demands. We wish to generate larger traffic to websites using RemindThis and an easy reminding service for visitors of the web. Leading the field is a task requiring not only a maximum attention to the tiny details supplied by the service but also to learn, evolve, develop and stand in the technological edge with a high-quality and convenient product. We definitely intend to leverage our web presence shortly.

RemindThis can be implemented in any website within minutes. Operating a website? After a quick sign-up you get an activation code and you can create the reminding button in mere seconds. The code supplied will be needed to be coded inside the website. Visiting interesting websites? Wish to get a reminder to revisit them? Simply click one of the RemindThis buttons and start enjoying yourself. you can add a RemindThis button to any website. The website visitors will click the button, ask for a timed reminder, receive a fitting message in due time and traffic to your website grows. A wonderful, simple, efficient and free of charge service!
